title: New: Andrés – Photoshoot
body:
Managing to fit references to Hot Hot Heat, Outkast and Steve Aoki all into the same track is pretty impressive.

Photoshoot, the slick new single from LA’s **Andrés** manages to toe the fine line between uber cool and cheesy, almost how I’d imagine Frank Ocean might sound were he to try and write a radio hit for Drake – lyrics like “So I took your ass out, pizza and karaoke / We’re on our way and you start playing Steve Aoki” stand out in particular. Check it out below.
